sect1.title: Mark a bug fixed
sect1.para: Bug fixed, changes commited to CVS, now mark the bug fixed.

listitem.para: Go to the bug you fixed and is assigned to you.

Select the Resolve bug, changing resolution to radio button. Then select the proper resolution. Usually you'll select FIXED here, but there are times when you select other ones like cases where a reported bug is invalid (INVALID), or we know about it but won't fix it (WONTFIX) and so on.
Click on the Commit button to commit the changes to the database.
